attributes.action: refuse permission to proposals by BCB Environmental Management Limited to Change the use of a warehouse and adjoining land to an Energy from Waste Facility incineration plant, including an 18m high chimney stack on land at Marston Moor Business Park, Tockwith only a few hundred metres from a housing estate and a school.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: An application has been submitted to create a gasification plant very close to the village of Tockwith, North Yorkshire. This will be considered by North Yorkshire County Council shortly.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
